name: Take the Risk
description:
A  2021 GMTK Game Jam Submit

Top-Down Shooter where your damage is joined together to your missing health.

Will you fight the waves of enemies with a lot of health in a safe way? or will you be on the edge of dying for the extra damage and take the risk?.

Playing with a joystick is highly recomended.

You can download the game instead of playing in-browser if you prefer.
